overview:
Gary Baldus is VP of Operations for Cotendo, he has over fifteen years of management and operations experience for Internet infrastructure and technology companies.

Prior to joining Cotendo, Mr. Baldus was VP of Infrastructure for Limelight Networks, where he managed CDN service infrastructure implementation, service capacity planning as well as Telecom provider relationships. Previous roles at Limelight include VP of operations and engineering, where scope of responsibility included network engineering, operations, and customer service, as Limelight scaled from a technology startup to a leading global CDN service provider. Previous management roles at Internet infrastructure, Telecom, and software technology companies including Frontier Communications (now GlobalCrossing), Excite@Home, MCI Worldcom, and Infonet. Baldus has a BS in Business from Arizona State University.
